The image was published on Facebook here on January 22, 2021.
The purported tweet reads: “Thank you World leader Mr. Prime Minister @narendramodi”.
It appeared to be in response to a genuine tweet from Prime Minister Narendra Modi congratulating Biden on his inauguration as 46th president of the United States.
The Facebook post’s Kannada-language caption translates to English as: “World leader Modi.”
The image of the purported tweet was also published on Facebook here and here and on Twitter here and here.
The tweet was posted on a fake Twitter account with the handle @JoeBidenPresid.
Biden’s official Twitter handle is @JoeBiden and his official White House handle is @POTUS.
The @JoeBidenPresid account has since been suspended by Twitter.
Furthermore, a search of Biden’s official accounts found no tweet thanking Modi.
AFP has debunked various hoax tweets purportedly sent by Biden's predecessor Donald Trump, including here and here.
